description: This delicious Korean-inspired stew cooks low and slow until the chicken is meltingly tender.
name: Spicy Chicken & Kimchi Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 chicken thighs (skinless, boneless, chopped into chunks)
0.5 bunch coriander (fresh, leaves picked, stalks sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a drizzle of oil in a large, hob-safe casserole dish and cook the chicken for 3-4 minutes. Add the garlic, onions, coriander stalks and ginger and cook for 5 minutes, stirring.

Pour over the kimchi, including the liquid, and the chicken stock, remaining oil and soy sauce, bring the boil, reduce the heat and simmer with the lid partially on for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve in bowls with fresh coriander on top and rice or noodles, if desired.
